targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp_in, count(*) OVER (ORDER BY timestamp_in) AS cumulative_count
FROM (
  SELECT *
  FROM failed_dns_loglines
  WHERE timestamp_failed >= 
)

SELECT time_bucket, -sum(number) as "(negative)"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp_failed, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM failed_dns_loglines
  WHERE timestamp_failed >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp_failed <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM logline_timestamps
  WHERE status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)
)
GROUP BY time_bucket;

panels.title: Entering/Processed Log Lines in time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp_in, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS " "
FROM server_logs
WHERE timestamp_in >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp_in <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
GROUP BY time_bucket
ORDER BY time_bucket
WITH FILL
FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1);

SELECT time_bucket, -sum(number) as "(negative)"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp_failed, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM failed_dns_loglines
  WHERE timestamp_failed >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp_failed <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM logline_timestamps
  WHERE status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64(timestamp, 6)) AS time_bucket,
    count(*) AS number
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6)) AND timestamp <= toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
  WITH FILL
  FROM toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__fromTime, 6))
  TO toStartOf${Granularity}(toDateTime64($__toTime, 6))
  STEP toInterval${Granularity}(1)
)
GROUP BY time_bucket;

SELECT 'Suspicious' AS state, MAX(message_count) AS maximal_size
FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps
WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND
      status = 'finished' AND
      timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Filtered' AS state, MAX(message_count) AS maximal_size
FROM batch_timestamps
WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND
      status = 'finished' AND
      timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Initial' AS state, MAX(message_count) AS maximal_size
FROM batch_timestamps
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND
      status = 'completed' AND
      timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime

panels.title: Max. number of entries per Batch

targets.rawSql:
SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector'
  AND 'Collector' IN (${include_modules:csv})
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND 'Prefilter' IN (${include_modules:csv})
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND 'Inspector' IN (${include_modules:csv})
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND 'Detector' IN (${include_modules:csv})
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_batches'
  AND 'BatchHandler' IN (${include_modules:csv})
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT 'Collector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median", 2 AS sort_order
  FROM (
    SELECT entry_count as value
    FROM fill_levels
    WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector' AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 'BatchHandler' AS name, median(value) AS "Median", 3 AS sort_order
  FROM (
    SELECT entry_count as value
    FROM fill_levels
    WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler' AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_batches' AND
          timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 'Prefilter' AS name, median(value) AS "Median", 4 AS sort_order
  FROM (
    SELECT entry_count as value
    FROM fill_levels
    WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter' AND entry_type = 'total_loglines' AND
          timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 'Inspector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median", 5 AS sort_order
  FROM (
    SELECT entry_count as value
    FROM fill_levels
    WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector' AND entry_type = 'total_loglines' AND
          timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 'Detector' AS name, median(value) AS "Median", 6 AS sort_order
  FROM (
    SELECT entry_count as value
    FROM fill_levels
    WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector' AND entry_type = 'total_loglines' AND
          timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
  )
)
WHERE name IN (${include_modules:csv})
ORDER BY sort_order ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_batches'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT timestamp, entry_count AS " "
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_buffer'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT *
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT *
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Batch Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_batches'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Buffer Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_buffer'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT *
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_batches'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines_in_buffer'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT *
FROM fill_levels
WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
  AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
  AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT median(entry_count) AS "Median"
FROM (
      SELECT *
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT min(value) AS "Minimum", avg(value) AS "Average", max(value) AS "Maximum"
FROM (
      SELECT entry_count AS value
      FROM fill_levels
      WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
      AND entry_type = 'total_loglines'
      AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
)

SELECT 'LogCollector' AS id, 'LogCollector' AS title, (
  SELECT count(*)
  FROM logline_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'log_collection.collector'
    AND status = 'finished'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS successful_count, (
  SELECT count(*)
  FROM failed_dns_loglines
  WHERE timestamp_failed >= $__fromTime AND timestamp_failed <= $__toTime
) AS filteredout_count,
successful_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__success,
filteredout_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__filteredout,
if(isNaN(arc__success), '-', CONCAT(toString(round(arc__success * 100, 1)), '%')) AS mainstat

UNION ALL 

SELECT 'BatchHandler' AS id, 'BatchHandler' AS title, 
0 AS successful_count, 
0 AS filteredout_count, 
if((
  SELECT count(*) = 0
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
), 0, 1) AS arc__success, 
0 AS arc__filteredout,
if((
  SELECT count(*) = 0
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'log_collection.batch_handler'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
), '-', CONCAT(toString(round(arc__success * 100, 1)), '%')) AS mainstat

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Prefilter' AS id, 'Prefilter' AS title, (
  SELECT sum(message_count)
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
    AND status = 'finished'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS successful_count, (
  SELECT count(*)
  FROM logline_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'log_filtering.prefilter'
    AND status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS filteredout_count,
successful_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__success,
filteredout_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__filteredout,
if(isNaN(arc__success), '-', CONCAT(toString(round(arc__success * 100, 1)), '%')) AS mainstat

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Inspector' AS id, 'Inspector' AS title, (
  SELECT sum(message_count)
  FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
    AND status = 'finished'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS successful_count, (
  SELECT sum(message_count)
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'data_inspection.inspector'
    AND status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS filteredout_count,
successful_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__success,
filteredout_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__filteredout,
if(isNaN(arc__success), '-', CONCAT(toString(round(arc__success * 100, 1)), '%')) AS mainstat

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Detector' AS id, 'Detector' AS title, (
  SELECT sum(message_count)
  FROM suspicious_batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
    AND status = 'finished'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS successful_count, (
  SELECT sum(message_count)
  FROM batch_timestamps
  WHERE stage = 'data_analysis.detector'
    AND status = 'filtered_out'
    AND timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
) AS filteredout_count,
successful_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__success,
filteredout_count / (successful_count + filteredout_count) AS arc__filteredout,
if(isNaN(arc__success), '-', CONCAT(toString(round(arc__success * 100, 1)), '%')) AS mainstat

SELECT 'LogCollector_BatchHandler' AS id, 'LogCollector' AS source, 'BatchHandler' AS target
UNION ALL
SELECT 'BatchHandler_Prefilter' AS id, 'BatchHandler' AS source, 'Prefilter' AS target
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Prefilter_Inspector' AS id, 'Prefilter' AS source, 'Inspector' AS target
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Inspector_Detector' AS id, 'Inspector' AS source, 'Detector' AS target

list.definition:
SELECT CASE 
    WHEN (dateDiff('minute', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 5 THEN 'Second'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 6 THEN 'Minute'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 72 THEN 'Hour'
    ELSE 'Day'
END AS interval;
list.name: Granularity
list.query:
SELECT CASE 
    WHEN (dateDiff('minute', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 5 THEN 'Second'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 6 THEN 'Minute'
    WHEN (dateDiff('hour', toDateTime($__fromTime), toDateTime($__toTime))) <= 72 THEN 'Hour'
    ELSE 'Day'
END AS interval;

list.description: Modules to be included in the comparison graphs and charts
list.label: Modules to include in comparison
list.name: include_modules
list.query: LogServer : 'LogServer', Collector : 'Collector', BatchHandler : 'BatchHandler', Prefilter : 'Prefilter', Inspector : 'Inspector', Detector : 'Detector'
